ideas_loneliness_quote: No one should be alone in happiness or sadness
ideas_neighbourless_quote: No one is rich enough to do without a neighbour
ideas_true_neighbour_quote: The true neighbour will risk his position, his prestige, and even his life for the welfare of others. ~Martin Luther King
ideas_strangers_quote: There are no strangers here; only friends you haven't yet met. ~William Butler Yeats
account_signin_prompt: Check what's happening in your neighbourhood
account_signup_prompt: You can manage your account later
account_if_no_account: If you do not have an account
account_great_you_here: It's great to have you here!
account_password_rules:
Password should have at least 8 characters
Use at least one lower case letter: a...z
Use at least one upper case letter: A...Z
Use at least one number: 0...9
Use at least one special character:
. , - _ < > ? ! @ $ ; : ( ) & % + - * / \
